# Examples

Bellow are various self contained examples

# Mustache

We can overload `Bonsai.write` to do the correct thing for our templates.

```julia
using Bonsai, Mustache, Dates

struct Template
	content
	variables
end

function Bonsai.write(
	stream,
	template::Template
)
	s = Mustache.render(template.content, template.variables)
	Bonsai.write(s, 
			Body(s),
			Headers(content_type = "text/html; charset=UTF-8")
	)
end

function index(stream)
	template = Template(
		mt"""
		<!DOCTYPE html>
		<html lang="en">
		<body>
			<h1>The time is {{time}}</h1>
		</body>
		</html>
		""",
		(time = now(), )
	)
	Bonsai.write(stream, template)
end

app = App()
app.get["/"] = index
start(app)
```
